ISSUE.TITLE: Setup failed: Target width 0 and height 0 must be greater than zero.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: Try to make a clean installation and the following message appears "Setup failed: Target width 0 and height 0 must be greater than zero." I could also mention an idea of the option to be able to install multiple languages during the first installation.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5219 Fixed problem with settings during installation
